circumstances: On final approach to San Jose Airport, both engines failed simultaneously. The airplane stalled, hit tree tops and crashed in a wooded area located few miles short of runway. All nine occupants were injured and the aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause: Inadequate preflight preparation on part of the pilot. Double engine failure caused by a fuel exhaustion. Inattentive fuel supply during flight. Auxiliary tanks purposely left empty to remain below gross weight. No enroute refueling accomplished.
